#!/opt/stack/bin/python
import xmlrpclib import os import os.path
from SimpleXMLRPCServer import SimpleXMLRPCServer
def write_token(node_type,t): f = open("/var/lib/docker-swarm/token",'a+') f.write("%s:%s\n" % (node_type, t)) f.close() return 1
def read_token(node_type): d = {} f = open("/var/lib/docker-swarm/token",'r') tokens = f.readlines() f.close() for token in tokens: (k,v) = token.split(':') d[k] = v return d[node_type]
def clear_token(): if os.path.isfile('/var/lib/docker-swarm/token'): os.remove("/var/lib/docker-swarm/token") return 1
server = SimpleXMLRPCServer(("&Kickstart_PrivateAddress;", 8000)) server.register_function(write_token, "write_token") server.register_function(read_token, "read_token") server.register_function(clear_token, "clear_token") server.serve_forever()
[Unit] Description=stacki-listener After=network.target
[Service] Type=simple ExecStart=/opt/stack/sbin/stacki-listener Restart=always RestartSec=10
[Install] WantedBy=multi-user.target
systemctl enable stacki-listener.service systemctl start stacki-listener.service
